author: SeaswimmerTheFsh, meelyman
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Suggestions!
You can find the source code of this cog here: https://github.com/SeaswimmerTheFsh/GalaxyCogs
You can find the original source code from SauriCogs here: <https://github.com/elijabesu/SauriCogs>
name: Suggestions
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user names, discriminators, and IDs upon sending a suggestion. This data is used solely to display and contact the user about any change to their suggestion.
